long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension that will highlight a list of words you supply on any website, works on iFrames and Ajax calls. Using regex to avoid any slowdowns or loops that cause crashing.

How to use:
1. Click the highlight this icon.
2. Click New.
3. Enter a title, select a color and enter the list of words you want to highlight separated by a comma.
4. Refresh your page and you're good to go!
